professionalexp.description: Worked on Bytedance Global Edge (BGE) which is Bytedanceâ€™s Kubernetesedge computing platform, providing Kubernetes as a Service organisation-wideand enabling Bytedance to deploy applications across every Bytedance Point ofPresence (PoP) location around the world. Developed a feature which allowsusers to receive phone calls on top of messages in lark as notifications over trig-gered alerts from Prometheus Alertmanagers. Developed a feature which al-lows users to automatically synchronise alerts across newly added/removed Ku-bernetes clusters under a BGE project. Developed using React.js (Typescript),Go, and PostgreSQL. Tested using Go-Testing, Testify and GoMock. Deployedusing Gitlab, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, Kustomize and ArgoCD.
